Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Those cursed sabertooths are mauling federation personnel in the Tuwangi Mire and must be stopped.

Kill those {@LinkCreature:5#13#inky sabertooths}.

Report to Zelia at the Tuwangi Garrison when your mission is complete.
Inky sabertooths down in numbers? I love it! I'll mark it right here on my chart, and I'll include it in my report!
Do I look like a sabertooth to you?
